General.Name: Ditto (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ditto (Thailand) Public Company Limited distributes document management solutions in Thailand. It also rents, distributes, and services photocopiers, printers, and technology products, as well as technology engineering services for various government agency projects. In addition, the company provides construction, mechanical and electrical engineering system, and information technology services. Ditto (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
